definition: anything serving as a representation of a person's thinking by means of symbolic marks, support or supply with references
details:
noun
- anything serving as a representation of a person's thinking by means of symbolic marks
- writing that provides information (especially information of an official nature)
= synonyms: written document, papers
- a computer file that contains text using seven-bit ASCII characters
= example: a computer file that contains text using seven-bit ASCII characters
= synonyms: text file
- a written account of ownership or obligation
verb
- support or supply with references
= example: support or supply with references
- record in detail
= example: record in detail
